name: Merfolk Knight
description: The Merfolk Knight is a humanoid adorned in robust armor, skilled both underwater and on land. It wields a trident with grace and can inspire its allies.
memorable: Its ability to inspire allies in battle makes it a unique supporter, while its amphibious nature allows versatility in various environments.
goals: To protect its aquatic home and support allies in combat.
relations: Commonly found alongside other merfolk or aquatic creatures, potentially serving aquatic deities.
environment: Typically resides in oceanic or freshwater environments.
strengths: Excellent in melee and ranged combat, particularly in aquatic settings; can inspire allies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to ranged attacks if not positioned wisely.
attacks: Employs a multiattack with its trident, dealing piercing damage with melee and ranged options.
most_powerful_ability: Knightly Inspiration, which enhances the combat capabilities of nearby allies for one minute.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 30 feet, allowing it to see in dimly lit environments.
skills: Has skilled proficiency in athletics and perception, enabling effective movement and awareness.
additional_information: Amphibious nature allows breathing in both air and water
Advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Can make a trident attack as a bonus action
test_queries: merfolk knight inspires allies in battle
